name: Luminous Exceed
description:
Recover from a crash in the centre of the earth, feed the flames to reach the sky and revenge!

Credits

Programming - Filip Andersson & Anton Eichwurzel

Level Design - Christoffer Lundberg

Music - Martin de Boer & Doxent Zsigmond

Art Assets

Player Character by MoikMellah
Castle, Grass, inside house and Temple by openpixelproject.com
Arrow Signs by SiteBender
Floating Platform and backgrounds by ansimuz
Egyptian Tomb by gtkampos
Sunset Tempel by Pyromantic
Tempel with Portal by Beast
Tempel by Surt
Flying Eye by Calciumtrice
Lava Tiles by FiveAsOne
Gems by Kelvin Shadewing
